archimate:Requirement.name: IR.2.5.6a: a) decomposition techniques to divide loss into different categories (e.g. using impact categories in the BIRT or different types of financial loss such as short term, long term, direct or indirect)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
